description: As many of you already know, there are very few bondage models out there who can take it like Amber Rayne. She proves it once again for us here at Waterbondage. I push our beautiful submissive farther and harder than I have pushed anyone in quite a while. From the standing splits against the column, to the last scene in the Houdini tank, she never gets a break. In scene two, she shows us how high she can take a strappado tie. Let me tell you that these ropes are tight! To make it worse, we turn the shower on and make our sexy heroine dance on tiptoe, trying to avoid the single-tail, which stings so much more against her wet, glistening body. In scene fours Houdini tank predicament, we show how the pressure of water depth affects how well Amber can breathe. Did you know that even with a large diameter breathing tube that it is difficult to fight against water pressure in as little as two feet of water? Amber does it in an inverted suspension with her arms tied tightly behind her back! Then the breathing tube is removed and we watch her do some of the longest inverted Houdini tank dunks ever. We love you Amber Rayne!
title: Amber "Amazing" Rayne
